code: export var SET_NAV_STYLE="SET_NAV_STYLE";export var SET_FOOTER_STYLE="SET_FOOTER_STYLE";export var SET_SHOW_MODAL="SET_SHOW_MODAL";export var setNavStyle=function setNavStyle(style){return{type:SET_NAV_STYLE,payload:parseInt(style)};};export var setFooterStyle=function setFooterStyle(style){return{type:SET_FOOTER_STYLE,payload:parseInt(style)};};export var setShowModal=function setShowModal(boolean){return{type:SET_SHOW_MODAL,payload:boolean};};
